mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS total_recruits FROM ADMIN.RECRUIT_BOARD WHERE REG_DATE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month
SELECT mc.CODE_GROUP, mc.CODE_NUMBER, mc.CODE_NAME, mc.CODE_DETAIL, mc.CODE_YN, cc.CATEGORY_COUNT FROM ADMIN.MASTER_CODE mc LEFT JOIN ADMIN.CATEGORY_COUNT cc ON mc.CODE_NUMBER = cc.CODE_NUMBER

SELECT REVIEW_SEQ AS "reviewSeq", REVIEW_TITLE AS "reviewTitle", WRITE_ID AS "writeId", TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "regDate", RECOM_COUNT AS "recomCount", VIEW_COUNT AS "viewCount" FROM ADMIN.REVIEW_BOARD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY RECOM_COUNT DESC, REG_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
